item.title: Cassie add a quote by Arthur Schopenhauer
item.description: "Every man takes the limits of his own field of vision for the limits of the world." -- Arthur Schopenhauer

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Cassie add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "The rights of every man are diminished when the rights of one man are threatened." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Plato
item.description: "One of the penalties of refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors." -- Plato

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Joy must be one of the pivots of our life. It is the token of a generous personality. Sometimes it is also a mantle that clothes a life of sacrifice and self-giving. A person who has this gift often reaches high summits. He or she is like sun in a community." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "The likelihood that your acts of resistance cannot stop the injustice does not exempt you from acting in what you sincerely and reflectively hold to be the best interests of your community." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To believe that what has not occurred in history will not occur at all, is to argue disbelief in the dignity of man." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "Our imagination flies -- we are its shadow on the earth." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Cassie add a quote by William G.T. Shedd
item.description: "A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for." -- William G.T. Shedd

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"The Roots of Violence: Wealth without work, Pleasure without conscience, Knowledge without character, Commerce without morality, Science without humanity, Worship without sacrifice, Politics without principles."
(<i>Young India</i>, 22 October 1925)" -- Mahatma Gandhi
